meanings.definition: Unpleasant or unattractive to look at.
meanings.sent1: The old, unsightly building stood out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left on the street was unsightly and smelled bad.
meanings.sent3: The unsightly painting made everyone laugh at its strange colors.
meanings.sent4: Her unsightly behavior at the party was like a neon sign of rudeness.
meanings.sent5: The unsightly stain on the carpet was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Not pleasing to the eye; ugly.
meanings.sent1: The unsightly scar on his face told a story of bravery.
meanings.sent2: The unkempt garden was full of unsightly weeds and overgrown bushes.
meanings.sent3: The unsightly sweater she wore clashed with her bright pants.
meanings.sent4: The unsightly truth was like a dark cloud hanging over their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The unsightly mess in the kitchen made it hard to find anything.
